name: Bridge4Scorer
description:
Bridge scoring for 4 players. You like to play bridge with friends? You are tired that Your results are completly dependend on "luck of cards"? Your results should be similar to playing a bridge tournament in a bridge club.
Bridge4Scorer simulates a team tournament with "open" and "closed room". The result for the "closed room" is calculated based on Bo Haglunds "double dummy solver" . You are competing with "perfect players" in the closed room.
Alternative You can score Your bridge tournaments just with points.
Bridge4Scorer keeps an archive of Your played bridge tournaments.
